channel.title: Suggestion to fix tornado
channel.description:
Make it so it makes all of someone visiting one player to visit another. Does not stop the occ immune.
This makes it much more tactical. You can dump all of prince's visitors onto suspected unseen, or get someone who you somehow know to be evil to get investigated by dumping all of someone asking suspicious the prev day onto them.
Or just dump your own visitors on a random, either way.
Example: Make all of 1's visitors go to 2. 2's visitors stay on 2

item.title: Suggestion to fix tornado
item.dc:creator: Ulkesh
item.description:
I like the current version better.

Also, your suggestion would make the Court Wizard nearly untouchable when he targets himself and redirects almost all of his visitors away.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion to fix tornado
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
But why? I’m not seeing where a half-transporter is more tactical, just less risky.
